name: 5-Minute Baguette
steps: Mix all the ingredients with a wooden spoon until combined. You will see the dough will form a ball.
Cover and let it rise for 8 to 10 hours at room temperature.
Sprinkle some flour on the counter, place the dough on it, and sprinkle more flour on top of the dough to avoid sticking.
Cut the dough into 4 pieces, stretch each piece gently into a baguette shape, and put it on a baking tray.
Bake it for approximately 25 minutes depending on how golden you want them.
